data.expected_result: Not sure, I think it should show something saying you don't have access to the channel. The same thing happens with servers/channels you don't have access to but it will stop loading eventually on its own.
data.short_description: Attempting to click on a link to a message in a DM that you don't have access to shows a never ending loading screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a user copy a message link in a DM. - Click on that link.
